name: Goldilocks and the Three Bears (akciom)
description:
A short choose your own adventure I made in LINK!

The story is pretty short and generic but it was fun to throw this together. I tried to make use of the different ways of navigating that may throw some variations into how people experience the story.

There's a notable lack of bears in this story.

I ran out of time.

The HTML version is brought here courtesy of link2html.
